page.title: 07HOME LIFE TYPICAL DAY
page.content: On Thursday I woke up at 7.30 a m, dressed, had my breakfast, washed my face and hands then sat down to watch the television until 8.10 a m, when I left the house to go to{school.}Mum took me in the car. I met all my friends in the playground and played with them until the bell went. At 9.0 a m I held the door open for children to go in. I went into class, put my chair down and took out my books ready for lessons. I finished school at 3.50 p m, and my Mum collected me by car. At home I changed out of my{school uniform}and went downstairs until it was time for tea. After tea I went out on my bike to the{BMX}track. At 7.30 p m, I went back indoors and watched{television until my bathtime. At 9.00 p m I went to bed.
